intro: Picradeniopsis schaffneri, commonly known as the Schaffner's picradenium, is a flowering plant native to tropical regions of South America. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its small, clustered flowers that are typically white or pale yellow. Its leaves are usually opposite and have a leathery texture. It is often found in humid, shaded environments within the understory of tropical forests.
